entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
